short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dominate our niche across social media platforms.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Dominate Your Niche On Social Media -- just 10 mins per day!

With influencer.sh, you can:
- aggregate, filter and organize your social feeds so you get a single inbox for managing your social media across sources.  It then helps you engage with your audience faster, while learning from this engagement to help you generate viral content.
- create engaging and viral social media content with the power of AI -- no social media copywriting expertise required.

This extension is the companion extension to our web app and allows better tracking of your social feeds.
